name: Heavy Sword Hero
description:
⚔️ ⚔️ ⚔️

Upgrade your weapon and swing you sword!

Defeat enemies, upgrade your sword and survive during 6 waves!

Controls :

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Mouse to Swing your Sword

A game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #166

The theme was "Upgrade your Weapon". 

Hope you like it! 

⚔️ ⚔️ ⚔️

More Informations :

- A game made with Unity

- Every sounds come from Envato : https://elements.envato.com/

- Art made in Photoshop (Player, Enemy, Sword, Rock, Grass)

Time repartition :

- Code and UI : 2h20

- Art : 30 minutes

- Post process and Sounds : 10 minutes
